mapper.update:
UPDATE standard_unit_record
merchant_product_serial_number = #{merchantProductSerialNumber},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
standard_product_unit_id = #{standardProductUnitId},
merchant_cate_tree_node_id = #{merchantCateTreeNodeId},
product_category = #{productCategory},
merchant_series_id = #{merchantSeriesId},
name = #{name},
alias = #{alias},
is_visible = #{isVisible},
subtitle = #{subtitle},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
type = #{type},
remark = #{remark},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
sale_tax_rate = #{saleTaxRate},
return_days = #{returnDays},
replacement_days = #{replacementDays},
guarantee_days = #{guaranteeDays},
is_vat_invoice = #{isVatInvoice},
is_vip_card = #{isVipCard},
is_enable_shelfLife = #{isEnableShelflife},
shelfLife_days = #{shelflifeDays},
is_vendible = #{isVendible},
gross_weight = #{grossWeight},
net_weight = #{netWeight},
code = #{code},
merchant_brand_id = #{merchantBrandId},
market_price = #{marketPrice},
promotion_price = #{promotionPrice},
status = #{status},
sale_way = #{saleWay},
sold_base = #{soldBase},
freight_explain = #{freightExplain},
shipments_explain = #{shipmentsExplain},
freight_template_id = #{freightTemplateId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
stock_warning = #{stockWarning},
create_userid = #{createUserid},
create_username = #{createUsername},
create_userip = #{createUserip},
create_usermac = #{createUsermac},
update_userid = #{updateUserid},
update_username = #{updateUsername},
update_userip = #{updateUserip},
update_usermac = #{updateUsermac},
is_spu_keyword = #{isSpuKeyword},
demo_sale_price = #{demoSalePrice},
competing_sale_price = #{competingSalePrice},
store_id = #{storeId},
presell_period = #{presellPeriod},
relevance_su_id = #{relevanceSuId},
buy_type = #{buyType},
WHERE id = #{id}
